# Audit Documentation

## Purpose

Architecture decisions, bootstrap guides, and consumer integration documentation for rylanlabs-shared-configs
v1.0.0.

## Archive

Temporary working-draft documents from initial bootstrap phases (Phase 0-5 execution artifacts).

**Location**: `archive/bootstrap-2025-12-31/`

These are kept for historical reference and troubleshooting but should not be referenced in production
use. Canonical docs above are authoritative.
